text: Hi everyone! My company, Intrepid (<http://www.intrepid.io>) is hiring Android developers in Cambridge, MA and NYC. We’re about 100 people that focus on building native apps, mostly for consumer-facing clients and brands. We’re looking particularly for mid-senior Android developers (1-3 years Android exp), but also very interested in senior engineers with less Android experience than that. Would love to chat if you are interested! <http://intrepid.io/careers>

attachments.title: Intrepid | End-to-end mobile strategy, development, and design
attachments.text: Intrepid is an end-to-end mobile strategy, design and development firm with offices in Cambridge, MA and New York City, NY. We help companies, from startup to enterprise, boldly navigate their mobile future.
attachments.fallback: Intrepid | End-to-end mobile strategy, development, and design

attachments.title: Careers at Intrepid | Intrepid Pursuits
attachments.text: Learn about opportunities to work at Intrepid Pursuits as a designer or developer.

text: <@U0548MM6B|bluecup> pinned a message to this channel.

Hey folks! EventBoard in Salt Lake City Utah is looking to hire a mid to senior level android dev. Feel free to contact my directly with questions about the job or company: <mailto:brendan@eventboard.io|brendan@eventboard.io> Here's the posting: <https://eventboard.workable.com/jobs/284545>

Website: <https://eventboard.io/>

Cheers!
